thread.section_title: TrustedHousesitters Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of TrustedHousesitters | www.trustedhousesitters.com | 2 of 171
thread.title: Sonja Earl

author: Sonja Earl
title: Sonja Earl
text: Trusted House Sitters throughly exceeded my expectations, at first I thought it looked too good to be true and with the membership fee, initially I was put off. However, I did some research and took the plunge, I joined up for a years membership at a snip of the price during a Black Friday sale (+ they are always offering deals). I then searched many home owners requiring a sitter for their pets whilst they travel away, safe in the knowledge that their home and pets are being looked after. I completely agree with the joining fee as this regulates the members and makes sure they are all genuine + there are a number of simple security checks, which also offer further peace of mind. My first house sit was in Denmark, looking after too wonderful cats in a beautiful home, which cost my nothing but the airfare and expenses. I got to explore the country for 2 weeks and came home to some friendly kitty faces each night, which is lovely when you are travelling alone or with company. I can't recommend Trusted House Sitters concept enough, intact, everyone I met whilst I was in Denmark, I told them about it!! So I am sure I have shared the love enough to get a few more members joining. Really excellent, well done Trusted House Sitters for creating these connections and making the site so simple to use : )
